text: 'idh yuhi rabuk -ayha alnby- 'iilaa almalayikat aladhin amdd allah bihim almuslimin fi ghzw "bdr" 'aniy maeakum 'ueynkm wansrkm, fqwwu ezaym aladhin amnu, sa'ulqi fi qulub aladhin kafaruu alkhawf alshadid waldhlt walssaghar, fadribuu -ayha almwmnwn- ruuws alkfar, wadribuu minhum kula taraf wmifsl
